title: ADAC (Architecture Diagram as Code)
short_description: ADAC is a proof-of-concept tool and specification that enables defining, versioning, and visualizing cloud infrastructure using machine-readable code. It treats architecture diagrams as a single source of truth, helping teams keep infrastructure documentation accurate, auditable, and aligned with real system design while showcasing innovation in Full-Stack engineering and DevOps tooling.
shortDescription: ADAC is a proof-of-concept tool and specification that enables defining, versioning, and visualizing cloud infrastructure using machine-readable code. It treats architecture diagrams as a single source of truth, helping teams keep infrastructure documentation accurate, auditable, and aligned with real system design while showcasing innovation in Full-Stack engineering and DevOps tooling.

title: Agentic Web Starter
short_description: Agentic Web Starter is a FastAPI-based backend template for building agentic and RAG-driven applications. It provides ready-to-use ingestion, retrieval, and chat APIs with integrated vector search (Qdrant) and persistent session memory (Redis), enabling teams to quickly develop, extend, and deploy production-oriented agentic workflows without rebuilding foundational backend infrastructure.
shortDescription: Agentic Web Starter is a FastAPI-based backend template for building agentic and RAG-driven applications. It provides ready-to-use ingestion, retrieval, and chat APIs with integrated vector search (Qdrant) and persistent session memory (Redis), enabling teams to quickly develop, extend, and deploy production-oriented agentic workflows without rebuilding foundational backend infrastructure.
